description: Queen Charlotte windflower (Anemone hybrida 'Königin Charlotte') is an amazing addition to any garden. Its stunning magenta and purple blooms have a unique and delicate appearance, and they will flower from early summer until frost. The foliage is glossy and green, making it a great groundcover. Queen Charlotte windflower can do well in both cooler and warmer climates, and will tolerate some drought. They attract butterflies and hummingbirds, making them perfect for a wildlife-friendly garden. They are low-maintenance and require minimal care, making them an easy and beautiful addition anywhere.
